Atom Bomb.NAME: Atom Bomb
Atom Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Poison Darts.NAME: Poison Darts
Poison Darts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X Necrotic Poison. Apply !M! Necrotic Poison to ALL enemies X times.

Toxin Wave.NAME: Toxin Wave
Toxin Wave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Necrotic Poison and -1 Strength to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Toxin Wave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Necrotic Poison and -2 Strength to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Hidden Blade.NAME: Hidden Blade
Hidden Blade.DESCRIPTION: Add a shiv to your hand and draw !M! cards.

Fluid Movement.NAME: Fluid Movement
Fluid Movement.DESCRIPTION: Keep up to !M! Block between rounds.

Abandon.NAME: Abandon
Abandon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card. NL Draw !M! card. NL Ethereal.
Abandon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card for each. NL Ethereal.

Life Link.NAME: Life Bind
Life Link.DESCRIPTION: Apply to an enemy. When you lose health, the bound enemy takes that much damage. NL Exhaust.

Massacre.NAME: Massacre
Massacre.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose all Strength. NL Affected !M! times by Strength.

Hemogenesis.NAME: Hemogenesis
Hemogenesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Heal !M! HP. Exhaust. NL Upgrade each time you lose HP while this is in your hand.

Improvise.NAME: Improvise
Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.
Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to upgrade and add to your hand. NL It costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.

Poisoned Strike.NAME: Poisoned Strike
Poisoned Strike.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! Poison. NL Affected by damage modifiers.

Looming Evil.NAME: Looming Evil
Looming Evil.DESCRIPTION: Can be played for !M! Energy to Exhaust. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a curse into your draw pile and reduce cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Energy to Exhaust. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a curse into your draw pile and reduce cost.

Hallucinations.NAME: Hallucinations
Hallucinations.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add !M! random card to your draw pile.

Sickly.NAME: Sickly
Sickly.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Block.

Languid.NAME: Languid
Languid.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, start next turn with 1 less Energy.

Delirium.NAME: Delirium
Delirium.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain Confusion for 1 round.

Voices.NAME: Voices
Voices.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle !M! Dazed into your discard pile. NL Ethereal.

Ghost Swipe.NAME: Ghost Swipe
Ghost Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

Ghost Defend.NAME: Ghost Defend
Ghost Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
